text: Blood and High Heels () is a 2012 Hungarian short film, directed and written by Dávid Géczy. It's official selected at Cannes Film Festival Short Film Corner. The film was also included in the France and Los Angeles Film Market list. It stars Iván Kamarás and Sonia Couling. == Plot == The film is about workplace sexual harassment, the worse relationship between one feminist secretary & one chauvinistic boss in the current world economic crisis. Rose Red (Sonia Couling) got a new job as a secretary during the economic crisis and a new boss Ivan Milkov (Iván Kamarás), who thinks "the world in crises, caused by women".Blood and High Heels's poster == Cast == * Sonia Couling - Rose Red * Iván Kamarás - Ivan Milkov * Alexis Latham - director == Music == * The Same Wind Blows - Marton Vojnits == References == == External links == * * * Blood and High Heels – Making of * * Europa Design Hungary (Vér és tűsarok gallery) * A film fanpage * Blood and High Heels - trailer Category:Hungarian short films Category:Hungarian films Category:2010s business films Category:2012 short films Category:English-language films
title: Blood and High Heels
